title: Getting yourself across
brief_description: Describes the art the speaker’s personality plays in getting ideas across to the audience. Shows how a speaker’s interest, preparation, sincerity, vitality, and confidence bring about a successful communication. Correlated with the book “General speech” by Baird and Knower.
